meanings.sent1: She mispositioned the vase on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: Please do not misposition the books on the table.
meanings.sent3: The robot mispositioned the cups, making a funny tower.
meanings.sent4: His mispositioned steps led him astray in the dark forest.
meanings.sent5: The mispositioned sign caused confusion for the visitors.

meanings.sent1: The misposition of the chairs made the room look crowded.
meanings.sent2: He noticed the misposition of the keys on the piano.
meanings.sent3: The misposition of the puzzle pieces made the picture look silly.
meanings.sent4: The misposition of the planets created chaos in the solar system.
meanings.sent5: The misposition of the ingredients ruined the recipe.
